name: Olivia Cronk
bio: Olivia Cronk is the author of the poetry collections Louise and Louise and Louise (2016) and Skin Horse (Action Books, 2012). Her recent work has appeared or is forthcoming in Bone Bouquet, Deluge, jubilat, Newfound, Noo Weekly, Spolia, Swine, and Tender; and in the multimedia anthology Electric Gurlesque. She coedits The Journal Petra with Philip Sorenson and teaches composition and creative writing at Northeastern Illinois University in Chicago.
